name: StreamSpec
overview:
StreamSpec is an Internet advertising network that specializes in monetizing images on web pages. StreamSpecâ€™s premier advertising platform, HoverSpec, transforms pictures into interactive and engaging experiences.

When a user rolls their mouse over an image, HoverSpec unleashes a wide array of relevant display ads, ranging from video, banners, music, and text based ads.

Their technology enables advertisers to launch highly targeted ad campaigns, while increasing user engagement, and garnering higher click through rates. StreamSpec creates new ad inventory and revenue streams for publishers while giving users complete control of the ad content.
